description:
A simple, quick and reliable self-rescue aid for sea kayakers. No inflation needed. No delamination. No punctures. Just pop your paddle blade into the built-in pocket and cinch it with the webbing buckle.

  • Bright orange nylon shell with reflective tape strips for visibility in low-light conditions
  • EPE foam won't hold water and will stand up to years of abuse
  • Dimensions are 46 x 22 x 8cm
  • Note: foam paddle floats are not designed to support a paddlers full weight; they are designed to offer additional buoyancy to aid re-entry
name: NRS Foam Paddle Float
